name: Marinated Cheese
author: trish555
summary: This is a very colorful and tasty appetizer.  Because it has such a stunning presentation, it is a great appetizer for the holidays.  I take this to every function and gathering we attend - only because everyone else requests it!
directions: In a jar with a tight fitting lid, combine the olive oil, wine vinegar, pimento, parsley, green onion, garlic, sugar, basil, salt and pepper
Cut the block of Cheddar cheese in half lengthwise
Cut crosswise into 1/4 inch slices to form squares
Arrange cheese squares alternately in a shallow baking dish with slices standing on edge
You can arrange in a single long row, or 2 parallel rows depending on the size of your dish
Pour the marinade from the jar over the cheese slices, cover and refrigerate for at least 6 hours, or overnight
To serve, remove slices to a serving platter so they are still arranged in an alternating pattern
Spoon some of the extra marinade over the cheese, and serve with crackers
